attributes.action: Withdraw Completely from joining the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Completely signing us over to EU rule and scrapping the pound will be disasterous for us. We should completely withdraw, keep the pound, cease pouring money into the EU and invest it into all UK public services, and keep the UK independant.

rejection.details:
There are a number of petitions on this subject, including:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/freeinformation/
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/FREEUK/
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/betterout/
If you still wish to launch your own, please resubmit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
